content: etta gauge 18-20sts x 26-28 row = 4 on us6 yarn worsted weight approx 200yds model is cascade 220 needle us6 4 00mm 16 circular and us6 dpn or size to obtain gauge ssk =slip slip knit together k2tog = knit two together cast on 80 stitches place marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist row 1-6 k1 p1 repeat across round row 7 increase row knit increasing 25sts evenly across round for a total of 105 sts row 8-16 knit - - - 24 row 17 purl - 23 row 18 p1 yo ssk repeat \ 0 - 22 row 19 p1 k2 repeat - 21 row 20 p1 k2tog yo repeat 0 / - 20 row 21 p1 k2 repeat - 19 row 22 p1 yo ssk repeat \ 0 - 18 row 23 p1 k2 repeat row 24 purl - - - 17 repeat row 8-24 two more times 58 row completed row 59 decrease row knit decreasing 25sts evenly across row to 80sts decrease for crown changing to dpns when necessary row 60 k14 k2tog repeat row 61 k13 k2tog repeat row 62 k12 k2tog repeat row 63 k11 k2tog repeat row 64 k10 k2tog repeat row 65 k9 k2tog repeat row 66 k8 k2tog repeat row 67 k7 k2tog repeat row 68 k6 k2tog repeat row 69 k5 k2tog repeat row 70 k4 k2tog repeat row 71 k3 k2tog repeat row 72 k2 k2tog repeat row 73 k1 k2tog repeat row 74 k2tog repeat cut yarn leaving a 6 tail pull yarn through remaining 5sts and weave in ends note don t forget to block i used a combination of a dinner plate bowl and saucer to open up the lace panels
